 For debugging purposes.

Detailed Description

Represents a collection of cells.

This class is used to keep track of groups of gridcells and to aggregate the cells' pv values - for example when subscribing to a Region.

Author:
Per Alexius
Date:
Date
2006/10/02 16:05:13
